start.description: You glance at your surroundings, the smell of damp earth fills your nostrils. You are in a dark cave. You have no memory of how you got here. You see a lit doorway.

shrineSTART.description: As you enter the room, you notice you are in a shrine. There are lit candles and a statue of what appears to be a god of death. You notice a glowing orb on the altar.

orb.description: A glowing orb that seems to be pulsating with energy. It seems to be calling out to you.
orb.interact: You reach out to touch the orb and as you do, you feel a surge of energy coursing through your body. You feel a sense of power and purpose. You feel like you have been chosen by the god of death.

shrine.description: You are in the shrine. The orb is still glowing on the altar. a sense of purpose fills you.

gameSTART.description: You notice you are inside a dungeon, the walls are damp and the air is musty. There are two paths ahead of you, one to the left and one to the right.

randomRoom.description: You find yourself in a mysterious room. The walls are adorned with ancient symbols and the air is filled with an eerie silence.

randomRoom2.description: You stumble upon a hidden chamber. The room is filled with treasures and artifacts from a long-lost civilization. The air is thick with anticipation and mystery.
